thread.title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
thread.title_full: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game

title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
text:
> Pennsylvania Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game Pittsburgh Pirates starting pitcher Gerrit Cole throws against the Chicago Cubs in the first inning of the National League wild card baseball game , Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
